word:
"Sunnyside," Cooranbong, N. S. W., 
                                                      May 26, 1896 

Elder O. A. Olsen 
     Review And Herald 
        Battle Creek, Michigan 

My Dear Brother Olsen: 


     I received the American mail on Monday, the 25th, and today, Tuesday, Sister McEnterfer read me a letter of which I send you a copy. Whether this particular case is correct or incorrect, just such scenes have been presented before me.
